mapper.sql: SELECT id, name, code, status, sort, remark, created_at, updated_at FROM sys_dict
mapper.select: ORDER BY sort ASC, id DESC

WHERE code = #{code}
OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 1 ROWS ONLY
FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dict ( name, code, status, sort, remark, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{code}, #{status}, #{sort}, #{remark}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_dict SET name = #{name}, code = #{code}, status = #{status}, sort = #{sort}, remark = #{remark}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
